xml:
Oral suspension
Cautionary and advisory labels

Label 9 - Space the doses evenly throughout the day. Keep taking this medicine until the course is finished, unless you are told to stop

Label 14 - This medicine may colour your urine. This is harmless

Label 21 - Take with or just after food, or a meal

Nitrofurantoin 25mg/5ml oral suspension sugar free <ph outputclass="manufacturer">(AMCo)</ph> 5420911000001103

Nitrofurantoin 5 mg per 1 ml

  • 300 ml POM

    NHS indicative price = £260.46

    Drug Tariff (Part VIIIA Category C) price = £260.46

  • 300 ml POM

    NHS indicative price = £260.46

NITROFURANTOIN
